meanings.definition: The state or quality of being crumbly.
meanings.sent1: The crumblinesses of the cookie made it easy to break apart.
meanings.sent2: I love the crumblinesses of freshly baked bread.
meanings.sent3: The crumblinesses of the sandcastle made it look like a crumbling ancient ruin.
meanings.sent4: The old book's crumblinesses reminded me of the passing of time.
meanings.sent5: The crumblinesses of the dry leaves underfoot signaled the arrival of autumn.

meanings.definition: The tendency to break into small fragments or crumbs.
meanings.sent1: The crumblinesses of the crackers made them perfect for dipping.
meanings.sent2: The cake's crumblinesses made it difficult to cut neat slices.
meanings.sent3: The crumblinesses of the cookie caused a delicious mess on the plate.
meanings.sent4: The mountain's crumblinesses made it challenging for climbers to find stable footing.
meanings.sent5: The crumblinesses of the sand made it hard to build a sturdy sandcastle.
